name: scented
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a pleasant strong smell, usually because a pleasant-smelling substance has been added to it: scented candles scented soaps/bath products The air was scented with lavender. Opposites
odourless UK formal
unscented
(of flowers) having a sweet smell: It carries pale, yellowish, scented flowers in spring. She loved plants with large blooms and anything highly scented. Synonym
perfumedCompare
smelly
stinky informal
More examplesFewer examplesIndulge in your favorite scented bath products.Tuck a scented sachet into the toes of your favorite pumps to keep them smelling sweet.delicious fudgy brownies scented with cinnamonThe dry cold air was scented with woodsmoke.I planted some wonderful, dark-red, scented wallflowers.There are some varieties with scented flowers.
